div.p: Yeah, I have a daughter now, she’s 18 months and she lives with me; I have a boyfriend as well and we live in a nice little house
he works, I work, she goes to nursery which she really enjoys. I’m working which I really enjoy so yeah it’s a really good work-family balance
I’m very happy at the moment. In my spare time I spend time with my daughter, see friends, go out for meals, go to the pictures,
I go for walks, like climbing hills, I like being outdoors, I’m quite an outdoors person really which is nice when you do get the time off
because if you're in in an office all week it’s nice at the end of the week to be able to get out as long as the weather’s nice.
